body: The action and exposition was great, but the abysmally small amount of porn was the disappointing shit on top of an otherwise wonderful sundae.
What a waste if you want to draw battle manga then do that but don’t try to mask it under porn
If you guys want the fight scenes go read all the 87 page manga (7/10 for me tho). If you were expecting to see some hentai here dont even bother reading it's just one page.
